title: ui5 deploy
content:
# ui5-deploy.yaml

```yaml
# yaml-language-server: $schema=https://sap.github.io/ui5-tooling/schema/ui5.yaml.json
specVersion: '3.1'
metadata:
  name: worklist
type: application
resources:
  configuration:
    propertiesFileSourceEncoding: UTF-8
builder:
  resources:
    excludes:
      - "/test/**"
      - "/localService/**"
  customTasks:
    - name: ui5-task-zipper
      afterTask: generateVersionInfo
      configuration:
        archiveName: worklist
        relativePaths: true
        additionalFiles:
          - xs-app.json
    - name: ui5-tooling-transpile-task
      afterTask: replaceVersion

```
